column1: # QAD Sample CSV Configuration for ATX Container Test Runner
# This file demonstrates the CSV format for specifying S3 folders to process
# - s3_path: S3 URI to folder containing Progress code files
# - build_command: Build command (typically 'noop' for Progress analysis)
# - output_s3_path: S3 URI where results should be uploaded
# Note: "folder" and "menu" are used interchangeably - both refer to directories containing code
